simplified: 科学技术是第一生产力

pronunciation.pinyin: kē xué jì shù shì dì yī shēng chǎn lì
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ke1 xue2 ji4 shu4 shi4 di4 yi1 sheng1 chan3 li4

details.simplified: 科学技术是第一生产力
details.traditional: 科學技術是第一生產力

meanings.value: science and technology is the number one productive force (from a 1978 speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] introducing the Four Modernizations 四個現代化|四个现代化[si4 ge5 xian4 dai4 hua4])
